A Copyright Vow
June, 2013. MPA Copyright Awareness Scholarship. For this contest I decided to have a musical artist tell the woeful story of his life falling into ruin because of inconsiderate pirating.
Dorm Life at Iowa State
April, 2013. IRHA "Why I Live On Campus" Video Contest. A college student makes a convincing argument to his new roommate about benefits of living in Iowa State's dormitories.
Passwords
March, 2013. Information Security Awareness Contest. A jingle about password security.
Superhero Engineering
Jan, 2013. IEEE "How Engineers Make a World of Difference" Contest. Everyone thought Jim was just a normal guy... but he had an alter-ego...
Put Your Phone Away
March, 2012. Project Yellow Light Contest. A short rock music video discouraging texting while driving.
The Solution Kids
February, 2012. Toyota Teen Drivers Video Contest. Yet another music video discouraging texting while driving. This one's 80s themed!
I Got You Ethanol
December, 2011. IRFA Fuel the Future Video Contest. Give your car the greatest gift it could ask for... Ethanol!
Interesting Life
November, 2011. ABA "Lights, Camera, Save!" Video Contest. Invest your money in a bank account, and you accumulate interest. What if you could invest even more?

About Me

My names Sam and I hope I made a website. I have a passion for llamas, but most of all small rodents. I wish I was left-handed. Naw mean? I've tried my luck in the rap game, but after you lose enough rap battles, it gets kind of old. Ever been to the Grand Canyon? Me neither. Seems like a cool thing to go visit, though.
